name: Super Chicken Factory v1.1
description:
Author : NICOLAS Ralph

critics and comments at

nicolas.ralph@gmail.com

Controls:

A,W,D for player 1

<,^,> for player 2

* Collect crates or

Jump on your opponent to win

* Avoid Trap

* Chickens freeze you

* Jump on chickens to kill them

* On sudden death, grab a crate to win

all made by me with Unity, theGimp and Blender3d
